Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the size of the leatherback turtle based on the video.
Falters at times: The claim falters in accurately representing the size of the turtle due to the use of different camera lenses and distances in the videos.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or measurements to accurately determine the size of the turtle in the video.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the turtle in the video is abnormally large without concrete evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The size discrepancy between the two videos suggests that there may be alternative explanations for the perceived size of the turtle.
